properties.entry: INSERT INTO POSTALL ( POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, RECEIVER_NO, CALLER_NO, STATUS ) VALUES ( 'PO' || SEQ_POST_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, SYSDATE, ?, ?, 'Y' )
UPDATE POSTALL SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE POST_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, RECEIVER_NO, CALLER_NO, STATUS FROM POSTALL WHERE RECEIVER_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POSTALL WHERE STATUS='Y'
SELECT USER_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NAME = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, RECEIVER_NO, CALLER_NO, STATUS FROM POSTALL WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
